name: Dragonfly Dreams
description:
What fun is having "dragon" as part of your name if you are not a dragon?  What if you could change that?  Well, in your dreams you can!

This version  includes 8 playable levels, with many more coming in future updates.  It has many improvements from the demo version, including the ability to become an acid spitting dragon.

Upcoming updates include ice and fire dragons and more challenging levels.

All funds from the game will go towards improving the game and developing another game, Dia de los Muertos (Day of the Dead). A murder adventure mixed with hack and slash, fighting many undead legends.
